attributes.action: allow Pagans to carry knives to and from sabbat and esbat rites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of knife carrying laws being tightened it is important to remember that sometimes people have valid reasons for carrying them. One reason overlooked by law is that the knife or 'athame' is an important part of many pagan religious ceremonies. To avoid unjust prison sentences and religious persecution, sign the petition.
